thread.title: Apple unveils iPad Pro — now with Pencil

author: Wendy Lee
title: Apple unveils iPad Pro — now with Pencil
text:
Photo: Eric Risberg, Associated Press print_article_embed|photo-8602498|article-6493579|7 comments_jump_embed|photo-8602498|article-6493579|1 email_share_embed|photo-8602498|article-6493579|1 facebook_share_embed|photo-8602498|article-6493579|2 twitter_share_embed|photo-8602498|article-6493579|3 pinterest_share_embed|photo-8602498|article-6493579|4 reddit_share_embed|photo-8602498|article-6493579|5 google_share_embed|photo-8602498|article-6493579|6 Apple CEO Tim Cook discusses the new iPad during the Apple event at the Bill Graham Civic Auditorium in San Francisco Wednesday. Apple CEO Tim Cook discusses the new iPad during the Apple event at...
Apple on Wednesday unveiled the latest version of its tablet, iPad Pro, with a larger screen and faster processing than most portable PCs. Apple CEO Tim Cook discusses the new iPad during the Apple event at the Bill Graham Civic Auditorium in San Francisco Wednesday. Apple CEO Tim Cook discusses the new iPad during the Apple event at...
Apple on Wednesday unveiled the latest version of its tablet, iPad Pro, with a larger screen and faster processing than most portable PCs.
